definition.achievementDescription: Use the plastic wand to get a random class item! Keep this safe, you cant get another, as the advancement can only be gotton once per player!
definition.triggerxml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="item_damaged" x="119" y="126"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:PlasticWand</field></block></value><value name="amount_l"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="amount_h"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><next><block type="advancement_trigger" deletable="false"></block></next></block></xml>
